content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you considering to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for the most affordable option. I would like to pay 300 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros per month is far below the market rate for my apartment. It's a new, centrally located property with all amenities nearby. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to consider a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I am willing to pay more. However, 500 euros per month is my limit as a student. I cannot afford more than that.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Maryam. 500 euros is closer to what I'm seeking, but I still believe my apartment is worth more, especially considering the prime location and the recent construction. Can you offer anything in between 500 and 600 euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I can offer 450 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for a student apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While 450 euros is closer to what I'm looking for, I must reiterate that my apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after area. I believe a price closer to 550 euros would be more appropriate. Would you be willing to meet in the middle?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 500 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros per month is still not enough for me to consider renting out my apartment. It's a brand-new, modern property in the city center, and I'm looking for a rent that reflects its value. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need a price that compensates me for the investment I've made in this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I can offer 525 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your offer, Maryam. While 525 euros is closer to my expectations, I still believe my apartment is worth more, given its location and condition. Can you go up to 550 euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 550 euros per month. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 550 euros per month. My apartment is brand new, in a highly desirable location, and I believe it warrants a higher rent. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality of the property and the amenities it offers. Would you be willing to go up to 600 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I cannot afford more than 550 euros per month as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your financial constraints as a student, Maryam. However, my asking price reflects the value of the apartment. If you're unable to meet my request for 600 euros per month, I'm afraid we will have to part ways. I wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable accommodation within your budget. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
